title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When clicking on a link in the welcome page, the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
EB: The links should be selected when clicked to provide more context to the user when they return to the welcome page.
SR:
To reproduce:  
1. Launch the application and ensure you get a welcome page when you restart.  
2. Remove the 'welcome.startup' line in 'prefstore.ini' of the workbench metadata.  
3. Click on any link in the welcome page.  
4. Notice that the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when you return to the welcome page.
